Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Heart Disorder/Arrhythmia/Supraventricular Arrhythmia/Supraventricular Tachycardia/Multifocal Atrial Tachycardia
Record.Description: An electrocardiographic finding in which the electrical axis of the p wave is variable and the rate is greater than 100 beats per minute. To meet criteria for multifocal atrial tachycardia, the p wave must exhibit three distinct morphologies on the rhythm strip.
